page.title: 15Kelsey Park, Beckenham
page.content: Kelsey Park is a pleasant suburban park to the south of Beckenham High Street. It has several unusual attractions including an aviary with exotic birds and a large lake with several species of duck including Mallard and Muscovy. A large part of the park is prohibited to dogs so that the wild birds are not disturbed. In this area there also a large number of grey squirrels which are very tame. Facilities in the park include a play ground for younger children, and tennis courts and a bowling green. The park is well maintained and is much used by local people. A number of expensive houses back onto the park enjoying the trees and plants and the lake with the River Beck running through it.
